fields.content: I use the Firefox High Contrast extension. It’s not perfect but helps a lot with small text.
Designers keep prioritizing aesthetics over usability. Even WCAG guidelines are often ignored.
As someone with mild astigmatism, I struggle with light greys too. I thought it was just me!
Might be a device-specific bug. On my iPhone 12 it’s fine, but my niece’s SE is laggy too.
I noticed the same thing. Turning off "Reduce Motion" helped a bit for me.
Honestly, lack of a ramp is unacceptable. They could’ve used a portable one.
